reviews.title: Solid TV, no complaints
reviews.text:
The TV was extremely easy to program, user-friendly, and all the needed apps preloaded. For the size of the TV, the sound is phenomenal. Having ability to run it on AC or DC is a very nice benefit. We installed this on our boat in the guest state room, we received favorable feedback from our guests.
If I could, one recommendation, for the manufacture, would be to add the ability to adjust the sound, such as bass travel in mid range. Although the sound is phenomenal, I would like to get a little more base and reduce the mid range slightly. I strongly recommend this TV for your RV or boat.

reviews.title: Honest Technical Review - Image Adjustment Detail
reviews.text:
I bought TCL 55" Class 4-Series 4K UHD HDR Smart Roku TV - 55S451 to replace a 5 year old model HiSense 55" 4K TV.  

PICTURE QUALITY
While the picture brightness isn't quite as bright as what I'm used to, the image quality is outstanding for the price.  TCL team if you are reading this, you will need to improve in this area to stay competitive with other manufacturers.

To maximize the picture quality, here are the settings that I used. 
1. TV Brightness = "Brighter"
2. Picture Mode = "Vivid"
3. Customize Picture > Back Light = "100"
4. Customize Picture > Brightness = "50"
5. Customize Picture > Contrast = "100"
6. Customize Picture > Sharpness = "50"
7. Customize Picture > Color = "60"
8. Expert Settings > Dynamic Contrast = "High"
9. Expert Settings > Gamma Correction = "2.4"
10. Expert Settings > Noise Reduction = "High"
11. Expert Settings > Color Temperature = "Cool"
12. Expert Settings > Color Space = Default Setting
13. Expert Settings > Auto Setting = "Standard"

Overall, I would say the whites in the picture are good but not great.  This would improve if the nit brightness were increased. The black colors with the adjustments above are very good.  

SOUND QUALITY
Sound quality of the speakers is good for this TV.  Although I would like to see a menu option to change the Equalizer settings to adjust highs, mids, and lows.  This is especially important when adding a sound bar or external speakers. 

WALL MOUNTING
Wall mounting was straight forward.  TCL provided screws in the top two holes for wall mounting, however the bottom two holes are empty and you will need to bring your own hardware.  Not much of an issue there, however the mounting holes are a tad bit too low for my existing wall mount bracket setup.  Not all manufacturers have the same spacing design which is understandable; although, this design can be slightly improved. 

CONCLUSION
I would gjve this TV an 8.5 out of 10 based on the value and overall quality of this model. 

Great job TCL team!

The legs measure 38" across and 9.5" deep so I have and inch on each side left until I decide to get another stand in the future. The screen itself is 44' across, 23.5" tall (28" tall from the legs to the top of the screen) and about 50.5" diagonal.  I hope this helps many of you with those questions. I really like this tv and hope you enjoy the picture and sound quality that I have come to know with mine.

reviews.title: OK for the price
reviews.text: For the price, I want expecting much. They're ok. The seat cushions aren't removable and the seams aren't entirely straight. There's a gap in the back where the seat back attaches to the base, and I don't think they'll last long with regular use. That being said, they are usable and of you're on a budget, they aren't terrible.

reviews.title: Handsome Chair
reviews.text: Love the chair.  The color, size,  and fabric are all as detailed in the product specifications.  Chair assembly took minutes.  Screw the legs in and glide the back into place, done. Just the pop of color needed in our space.  We are only using it as an occasional accent chair, so it should hold up well.

reviews.title: Classic and versatile style, fairly easy assembly
reviews.text:
I can see why this is a popular piece — the style is classic and versatile to many decorative aesthetics.  Assembly was fairly easy, not too many parts to worry about.  Feels sturdy, my dogs have already jumped on it.  Looks perfect in my living room.

Note: I put a different cover on the pillow it comes with.

reviews.title: Great chair for the money.
reviews.text: It is lower to the floor like most mid century modern furniture but has a deep seat and works well for any size person. The material is nice and I love the muted greenish /gray color.  It comes with a very small cushion for back support but I switched it out for a thicker accent pillow. I'm 5'4” tall and 135 pounds so I needed that for optimal comfort. I highly recommend this chair. It was easy to assemble.

reviews.title: Great chairs and excellent value
reviews.text: We were looking for a couple of relatively inexpensive accent chairs to replace a couple of uncomfortable chairs we had in our back room. What a bargain and the chairs are beautiful and well made. Solid wood frame, thick comfortable cushions and love the style. Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.title: Great for the price point!
reviews.text: I was nervous to try these, however I finally went for it since two of these are the same price as one mid century modern chair from Target. The fabric and the wood is beautiful and feels like good quality. It took about 20 minutes to assemble each chair. The longest part was simply getting the padding off each piece. They were packaged wonderfully. The biggest con that makes these 4 start for me is that they are very firm and there isn't much padding in the back. I added a pillow to it for now for comfort and might add a better lumbar pillow. The pillows that came with them were awkwardly small. Overall these are very stylish, affordable chairs that I won't mind my dog and kids living in.

reviews.title: Cheap quality as expected, but surprisingly comfy!
reviews.text: Ordered 2 of the green colored chairs—they're super cute and a great size, but the quality is just okay. 1 chair was broken but I was able to return and get a replacement the next day. However, all 3 chairs I received came with bolts that were too short to use. I had to go to a hardware store to buy longer ones which was a huge hassle. Then when the other chair arrived, we realized if you switch the right and left legs, the bolts they give you will work (for some reason the holes in the legs are different girths depending on which side you put them in from). However, that chair also had the holes in the cushions misaligned so it took two people to fit everything together. But that's what you get when you buy such a cheap chair. Because it's so cheap I was worried it would be uncomfortable—however the seat cushion is comfy! The back cushion is kind of stiff but with a pillow it's fine. The photo in the ad makes it look slightly darker green and kind of suede/soft but it's really linen and almost like a soft denim type material.

reviews.title: It would be perfect if it were comfortable!
reviews.text: Extremely cute chair! I love the MCM style and the color green is exactly what I was looking for. I also like that it comes with a pillow. As much as I like the look of this chair, I do not like that I will never be able to sit on it.  This chair is as hard as a rock! I don't even think it's worth trying to break it in so I will be returning it.

reviews.title: Forgot I even ordered this
reviews.text: I've been in the same industry for going in 19 years in 2024. I haven't always had to wear specifically a black shirt like this but have shopped at Wal-Mart for them and like shirts of different colors for over half my life. I picked up some event shifts close to Christmas and throughout the new year, and when evaluating what I had, I decided on a whim to add this to my order, so I'd look a little more sharper than I would have wearing my faded black shirts from the past. After today's order arrived and I was checking it, I was asked to submit a review of this delivery, and because (I can only imagine) I was so busy the day it was being delivered and probably running late, I just put on the best looking shirt I had available not even thinking. (It has probably been 2-3 years since my last purchase of a long sleeved black shirt for work.  Upon literally quadruple checking, I don't even own a 2xl black long sleeve button up shirt, which makes more sense now as I have XL only and the one I wore felt tight as could be making me self conscious about gaining weight although the scale didn't budge much. Hoping I can figure out how to get this fixed, as I could really use that new black shirt! Tonight to be exact! Smh

reviews.title: 😁 BBQing
reviews.text: Well to start off follow directions, I tried to be a man an not. So ended up taking few parts back off an had to out back together. 😔 I think for the price its a win. We cooked enough food on it for 15 people as soon as we got it. Burgers, hotdogs, chicken, sausage, and some steaks. Its small but grill is enough to cook decent amount on. I got this for my husband and thought oh man is this gonna be a dud. Well surprise it wasnt. He loved it an couldnt believe only paid couple bucks shy of a 💯. Grant you its not like the big silver grills you ory are used to seeing, but i like it. compact enough and lightweight. We've had it on the back porch and front. Now I know we couldnt of done that with the bigger grills. Also even fully assembled can fit into the back of my vehicle. I have Jeep liberty if that helps with the sizing of it. So if we want to take to his parents or even camping so be it. So if ya want something small thats not going to take up limited space on your porch this is it. You can do everything on it that you can do on a bigger grill. we had on it at the same time 12 burgers 8 sausages and set a whole package of dogs on it. So If you need to grill more than that at a time maybe its not the grill for you. But for my family of four its a win. Plus I'm not heating up my kitchen an get to enjoy my husband to cook on it. When they say looks are deceiving well its true with this. Looks like something small an flimsy but very sturdy. I like the hooks to keep the utensils on and the sides you can put your platters on and it stays. So I guess win for me. I know they say bigger is better but not in this case. I'm happy with the purchase and glad I followed through an got it. We have been cooking on it a lot. It doesnt come with a tank so I had one an went an got it filled. So if you have one it cost me like 15 bucks to get it filled. So thats the only thing extra I had get. But I see tanks all over now at gas stations not sure how much. Oh when we hooked it up I thought wed have to light it because of the chain thats with it. But no you turn the knobs and it clicks an starts. So thats another good thing. Hope this helps with your decision on buying. Hope you enjoy the grill an get to bbq and enjoy. Dont mind the mess we've been outside an grillin a lot since I purchased this. 😁✌️

reviews.title: Engulfed in Flames after 1-Month
reviews.text: Bought 05/21/24 Engulfed on fire 06/04/24.  The regulator that comes preinstalled from the manufacturer to the gas line totally melted and engulfed the entire grill in flames.  I see some previous reviews of the same problem.  SAFETY CONCERN!!!! This items should be recalled!!

It cooked evenly and the food turned out great!

reviews.title: Grill Expert
reviews.text: The is a great grill for a small or normal size family. Very simple to put together without the instructions. The instructions provided weren't very useful at all and that could be an issue for some. The screws for the drip pan holder don't fit properly on the grill. Something they really should fix..

reviews.title: My First Grill
reviews.text:
This is my first grill so I started small.
It's easy to cook on but was a little challenging to put together.

reviews.title: Nice entry level grill
reviews.text: This is not too hard to put together, I got stick at a couple of steps, but it took about an hour to put together. It ends up being a pretty rigid grill in frame but the top rack falls often, and collapsed on me while grilling, which kind of wasn't a surprise. The propane tank doesn't seat as it should on the rail, but also hasn't been an issue. This cooked everything up pretty nicely, I think for a little bit more I could have gotten something better but this is also pretty decent.

reviews.title: Grill
reviews.text:
When I received the grill some of the black coat was damaged On the grill, It was a little difficult to put together.
Due to 1 stupid screw, my advice is..put the screws in where the heat reflector is first and then screw in the other side otherwise you'll have to take it apart and redo it.

reviews.title: Engulfed in Flames after 1-Month
reviews.text: Bought 05/21/24 Engulfed on fire 06/04/24.  The regulator that comes preinstalled from the manufacturer to the gas line totally melted and engulfed the entire grill in flames.  I see some previous reviews of the same problem.  SAFETY CONCERN!!!! This items should be recalled!!

reviews.title: very flimsey and falls apart easily.
reviews.text: Grill keep falling apart.  The screws hold the horizontal pieces are stripped and not longer holds the grill together.   We've only grilled a few times.  We are no longer using due to the fact that we think it's a safety issue while the grill is lit and turned on.

reviews.title: It literally caused a fire on its first use.
reviews.text: It was difficult to assemble, but I figured since it was so cheap, it was worth a little hassle. However, on its maiden voyage for Memorial Day, it literally caught fire due to a faulty gas line. The part to fix it was $47, which defeated the purpose of a cheap grill. Do yourself a favor and spend a few more bucks or you, too, could have ruined family holidays!!!

reviews.title: Great buy
reviews.text: Directions were awesome… no words just great pictures. Went together like I hoped it would. Perfect for me snd my wife! Grilled chicken breasts- delicioso!! Why did I keep my old one for so long?

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.text: Great quality. Built by the popular Home Depot brand Nexgrill. Easy and quick to assemble. As long as you clean your grates and burner covers a couple times a month this will last you a good while. Can't beat it for the price.

reviews.title: Cheap and flimsy
reviews.text: First 30 min on the grill and the upper rack is eating and not staying together. Basically sitting on the first rack. Don't waste your money. Spend a few bucks more for better

reviews.title: Decent grill, good value
reviews.text: This is the 3rd or 4th one we've purchased for different properties. It's inexpensive and easy to use. Decent grill and so far they are all lasted. As our other grills have been rotated out of service, THIS is the grill I'm going with. Some sit in the sun and weather and some under a porch, but all have done well so far.

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.text:
This exceeded my expectations! I don't know how well it will hold up over time compared to a better quality grill, but it does great for a beginner on a grill. 

I will say that typically I put everything together on my own, but this was a little tricky at parts with what I felt like was vagueness in the instructions provided - it probably took me about 1.5 hours by myself.

reviews.title: Great buy!
reviews.text: Took about an hour to put together, you need a phillips head and an adjustable wrench or pliers. Pictures [there are no word instructions.]  I have used it almost every night for a week to avoid heating up my living space. I absolutely love it! Great little grill, especially for the price.

reviews.title: Mess on floor, Holes in the grill, no base cover
reviews.text: There's holes on the bottom base inside where the meat gets cooked and there's a small tray in the middle under that, that catches the juices that fall? But juice still escapes and makes it's way through the holes on the sides and theres no bottom base either on the level of the wheels. So just grease stains on the floor is what you'll get. Other than that it really is perfect. 🥲

reviews.title: Crap grill not worth half of what I paid
reviews.text: Couldn't be put together correctly, parts were damaged. Poorly made cheap plastic knobs are loose and wonky. Returning it and getting something better.

reviews.title: Nice grill
reviews.text: Easy to put together, a bit time consuming but I did it when I was sick cus I don't sit down ever. Haven't used it yet but overall very nice for the price. Comes with the propane hose already. Just need the propane tank and you're set.

The BBQ arrived damaged and rusty, once I finished assembling it I looked closely and it had several damaged and rusty areas... Not very good since the BBQ was damaged at the factory. The box arrived in excellent condition and was well wrapped. But once I put it together and took a good look at the areas, many areas are damaged.

reviews.title: Sale Grill
reviews.text: Purchased a new grill online at a sale price.  It was delivered quickly. It was easy to put together after studying the directions and putting it together and then redoing it to get it right. One hour later I had my grill finished and grilled up some chicken breasts.  UMMM good.

reviews.title: Disappointed to say the least
reviews.text: Product came defective.  The ignition spark doesn't work.  I paid for setup only to find out the product does not work.  Now I either have to disassemble it to ship it back or get a replacement part that I have to install myself so anyway you look at it I am out 100 bucks for assembly.  Cannot comment on the product because it came defective but super disappointed with Walmart's procedure to return.

reviews.title: Delivery was prompt snd grill eorkd good
reviews.text: I would definely buy again

reviews.title: Sale Grill
reviews.text: Purchased a new grill online at a sale price.  It was delivered quickly. It was easy to put together after studying the directions and putting it together and then redoing it to get it right. One hour later I had my grill finished and grilled up some chicken breasts.  UMMM good.

reviews.title: The big surprise!
reviews.text:
The delivery was rather a surprise. I did not know of any text I missed. However since I have Parkinsonism, I had to have my handyman put it together. He understood the directions, and quickly constructed the grill.
    The big box was empty. He connected a container of gas. He then christened the grill with steaks for us and them. Steaks were great. I will have a good summer using my new grill.

reviews.title: Great grill
reviews.text: Once assembled this grill works great!  Assembly was a bit complicated but it grills great burgers!

reviews.title: A little disappointed.
reviews.text: I bought this after trying to find a replacement for my 3 burner infrared unit. Reading through what was available, this appeared to be the one. A little disappointed with all of the flare ups from the somewhat open burner concept.

reviews.title: Time consuming
reviews.text: Hard to put together. Missing are the clips that holds the charbroil sign on grill. Appears the pins that hold it on are broken and signia just falls off need new one and clips to hold it on. Tried submitting photo but couldn't

reviews.title: Good barbecue but grates are hard to clean
reviews.text: It's good for value but the grates are hard to clean and the brush they give you melted right away I'm going to replace the grates hopefully

reviews.title: Love it but a few quirks
reviews.text: The grill cooks much hotter than previous grills I've owned.  I have to keep the grill on low and even then the temperature stays around 400 degrees.  It does heat very quickly.  Also, there is propane escaping even with all of the controls turned off. The only way to stop the propane from leaking is to turn it off at the bottle after each use.  Otherwise, I like the grill.

reviews.title: Disappointed to say the least
reviews.text: Product came defective.  The ignition spark doesn't work.  I paid for setup only to find out the product does not work.  Now I either have to disassemble it to ship it back or get a replacement part that I have to install myself so anyway you look at it I am out 100 bucks for assembly.  Cannot comment on the product because it came defective but super disappointed with Walmart's procedure to return.

The product was missing the wheels and the grates. The packeage has been sent to someone prior to me. Retaped and looks like the box was air dropped from a plane. I need to get a new one or a refund thank you.

reviews.title: Grill
reviews.text: Fairly straightforward to assemble. Drip pan slightly challenging to install. Grill cooks well so far.

reviews.title: Love this grill!
reviews.text: Love this grill, the ease of cooking and repeatability!  Even heat that makes grilling a delight.  Never burnt, unless I try to and easy to clean.  This is my 3rd and for the $, you can’t beat it.

Great grill! The assembly instructions included are terrible. If not for customer service suggesting we view the instructions online and then enlarge the photos, we would have returned the grill. We also had to use YouTube!

reviews.title: Even cooking
reviews.text: Bought it month ago. Hard to assemble but I am very happy.

reviews.title: Great Product
reviews.text: I like it that it does not flame up and burn the food, heat is distribution evenly.

reviews.title: Poor quality
reviews.text: Everything is so flimsy and  so cheaply made. Very disappointing.

reviews.title: Difficult to Move, Grates Difficult to Clean
reviews.text: The fact that there are only wheels on one side makes the grill difficult to move, especially in a small space.  Also, food builds up in the grooves and there is no way to scrape it off into some reserve or the bottom of the grill.  (It says that using the clean mode turns food into ash, but I have not found that to be the case.) You have to either remove the grates & clean them or I use an ash vacuum to suck up the crumbs.

reviews.title: Cooks fine. Ease of cleaning is a nightmare.
reviews.text: I have the TRU-infared grates on my grill. The grill cooks food well.......but the cleanup afterwards is infuriating. It is very difficult to get the bristles on any brush (wire or nylon) deep enough into the valleys of the grates to brush away greasy gunk that builds up. I cleaned with a brush after every use and still it builds up in the valleys. This makes the grill not function properly. I love to grill, I don't mind cleaning, but cleaning the grates ruin all the fun.

reviews.title: Tin can!
reviews.text: Disappointed! Compared to the last gas grill I purchased this is a piece of crap that probably won’t hold up to the elements. Campbells uses thicker metal for their soup cans!!!!

reviews.title: The worst grates design imaginable
reviews.text: Just received this as a gift. Sadly, this may be the worst grill I've ever used. I've never seen grates accumulate so much debris after just one cook. Very difficult to clean the porcelin grates to the point I might just give it away and buy something different.additionally thr ignitor button does does not work on this new product.

reviews.title: Queen Grilling
reviews.text: i had to put this grill together myself and the instructions is easy and understanding. after you put it together it looks so nice. I have been grilling every weekend with it. great buy.

reviews.title: Arrives damaged and customer service is no help
reviews.text: I ordered it to use this weekend. It arrived Friday and it was clear there was scratches which was fine but as I was already 50 % done the lid wouldn't line up at all. I tried several times to align it better but nothing the lid is damaged. Customer service was useless in helping me solve the problem. Now i don't have a grill to use this weekend.

reviews.title: Queen Grilling
reviews.text: i had to put this grill together myself and the instructions is easy and understanding. after you put it together it looks so nice. I have been grilling every weekend with it. great buy.

reviews.title: It's not bad!
reviews.text: For $120, it's not a bad grill. It does what need it to do. It feels on the cheap side but I'm ok with it. I've barbecue multiple times and I'm very satisfied!

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.text: Surprised my husband with this grill. He loved it. I put it together myself. Had some tough moments that needed 2 sets of hands but other than that things flowed smooth. He's been using it weekly since his gift in March. Great purchase and great price.

reviews.title: Easy assembly
reviews.text: Easy to follow setup instructions very good for the price.

reviews.title: looks beautiful
reviews.text: I just put this together the other day. It actually went smooth, putting it together. Reading the directions. They only parked that confused me was the warmer grate That connects to the lid. I had to YouTube it to see how that was put together, but the rest of the grilled was east to put together

reviews.title: Excelent
reviews.text: Pretty good and the price even better I make some excellent smoked and everything is delicious, the material is a little thin but for the price it is perfect, delighted with this purchase

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.text: Grill as pictured. No issues or complaints. Nice grill for the value!

reviews.title: Great Grill
reviews.text: It was easy to put together as long as you read the directions and remember to not tighten all the screws until you finish with the section. I made sure to season my grill with Pam spray so the paint wouldn't bubble and peel. I made sure to let the coals white over before closing the lid... to prevent it from over heating. It worked great... everything I wanted in a charcoal grill! I had the hardest time making the decision to purchase due to mixed reviews. But I kept telling myself some ppl just don't follow directions well and I believed in my abilities to figure out a solution to each negative review. Please purchase the grill if you are interested because you'd be glad that you did. And YouTube the reservations you may have it's plenty of videos to help you through.

reviews.title: Amazing buy
reviews.text:
I would give this more than five stars if possible. I love this grill! It's super easy to put together. The two tables and tool rack are so convenient. I also love that the charcoal tray is adjustable so you can change how close your food is to the coals. There's the charcoal tray and then a tray to catch the burned pieces so that they don't lay on the bottom of the grill. 
I haven't used the smoker yet, but I'm excited to.

reviews.title: this barbeque grill is simple fabulous...
reviews.text:
the looks are absolutely beautiful..
after having someone put grill together.the grill looks better in person

i love it ❤️ a

reviews.title: charcoal grill With offset smoker
reviews.text:
Affordable charcoal grill with offset smoker.
My husband loves it! 💕

reviews.title: Does the job
reviews.text: I researched many charcoal grills with different price points and this grill that the bill.  I am happy with this purchase.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.text: My wife loved it once she saw it on camera she didn't know I got her this as a surprise .. she then built it and made a bbq

reviews.title: Get your 6 pack out and get to work.
reviews.text: Great for the price. Took a couple hours and a few beers to put together. The instructions are okay but a little more detail would of helped. All around its a great purchase.

reviews.title: Cheap descent grill
reviews.text: Definitely a decent grill for the money. People in the reviews complaining about the lid melting off @ 600 degrees......why was your grill EVER near 600 degrees? If you're handy with tools, understand how to build things with basic instructions and have any sort of clue about how to actually grill with charcoal....get it and appreciate the cheap grill for what it is. Also, If you can't straighten a dent out or just dont want to...dont take the chance and trust the mail....buy it in the store and pick it up yourself. Mine was delivered flawless though.

reviews.title: Best bang for the buck.
reviews.text: For the money this unit cannot be beat. Assembly was simple, did it myself in about an hour. The unit can be used in a number of different ways, direct heat, indirect with the smoker box, sear in smoke box, grill direct in main compartment, etc. Made me wonder why anyone would pay upwards to a thousand dollars when this does the job nicely. No complaints about quality or construction, no reason to have it be any heavier. Rolls around the deck easily. All holes lined up, shelves are sturdy, convenient hooks for accessories. I am here to order another one if that tells you anything.

reviews.title: Great but screws loosened easily
reviews.text: The grill is huge, it's definitely a smoker, but like some of the other reviews the handle came off the same day I put it together and used the grill. Other than that it appears to be fine. I can't fully speak on the sturdiness just yet since it only been a few days and already I'm battling with the handle and came with a small scratch.

reviews.title: Not reliable paint.
reviews.text: This grill changed color during our first cookout of this year and I was embarrassed when my guests arrived. The description stated that the color will not change and it's made of new material to keep its rich color. The grill is spacious and I bought accessories for this thang, just upset of what the company promised, but the expectations were not met. I need to contact Walmart or the company…

reviews.title: this father's day gift was a hit!
reviews.text: so my husband has been wanting a new grill forever. he had the last one for a few years. and it was still great but losing color. he's been wanting one with a smoker and I found this one and it was SUPER cheap. all the others were $300. so I got this for an early Father's day gift and put it together for him while he was at work. and he loves it. all the table space on it is amazing. it's so much better than utensils and plates piled on one side table like with his old ones. this one actually has utensil hooks. 3 of them. and the long front table is great for setting plates there to get out food. and now the side table isn't even used lol. it's soo roomy. his old one was big enough for one pack of meat ( like 5 chicken breasts) and boxed in so utensils were hard to use. but this one opens all the way and no sides when open so it's very easy to get in there and do what's needed very easily. it has a top warming rack and a bottom adjustable hight cooking rack. super cool. it has a charcoal tray with handles for easy removal. the smoker is seperate and holds about a pack of meat and air flow to the big grill if you wanna use all of it at once. the big grill held 3 different packs of meat and still had room for 2 more. smoker also has a removable wood chip tray with no handles. took 2 hours to put together. but I also had kids to stop and tend to alot or it would have took maybe an hour and 15 minutes. the only flaw was the smoker side door. the pre drilled holes didn't line up right and the door actually closed half way over the screw that latches it and the latch was about a half inch past the half covered screw. but luckily my husband had extra nuts an bolts laying around and was able to use his drill and fix it correctly. and trust me, I had the door in the right holes. directions were clear and easy. not hard at all to put together. it was a fantastic purchase. it's huge. the pictures do it no justice. it's very sleek and modern looking. we both love it. especially him. and when time for a new one, we'll probably just rebuy this one. it's freaking awesome.

Please wipe down your grill before using because my caught on fire on one side of the grill smh I'm so mad but in the instruction book it says they put some type of protecter for the grill and u have to wipe down before use. But other than that I like the grill

reviews.title: Happy with my new refrigerator!
reviews.text: I love my refrigerator it fits perfectly in my bedroom! I had a refrigerator before but it wasn’t this nice it had one door and a little flip door for a small freezer that didn’t have any space! This new refrigerator has two doors, nice size freezer, two drawers in the bottom of the refrigerator, a a door compartment for storage space!☺️

This was my second attempt to order a small fridge.  The first one was delivered about 200 miles away.  Walmart did reimburse, and give me a $25 credit, but I still had to start the process again.  Also, the fridge wasn't even eligible for the $25!   I ordered this one, and it came damaged.  The freezer door is quite dented, it is still functional though.  I started a chat and was transferred to 3 different people.  No one asked how they could correct the situation, just wanted to start the return process.  This is a large item and returning is difficult.  I simply wanted to make you guys aware and possible get some credit.  Not to mention I placed 2 orders, with 3-5 items in each order, and received each item individually on different days!  Ever consider consolidating to save resources and energy??  No worries, I already cancelled my membership.

reviews.title: Happy with my new refrigerator!
reviews.text: I love my refrigerator it fits perfectly in my bedroom! I had a refrigerator before but it wasn’t this nice it had one door and a little flip door for a small freezer that didn’t have any space! This new refrigerator has two doors, nice size freezer, two drawers in the bottom of the refrigerator, a a door compartment for storage space!☺️

reviews.title: Great buy!
reviews.text: There is so much room in the freezer! I am using this for my office so I was concerned about the ability to store frozen food for lunches. It is about half the size of my home freezer. The fridge also has a lot of room and the ability to remove the trays to make room for taller items is great!

reviews.title: I Love This Mini Fridge!
reviews.text: I love everything about this fridge- the freezer part on top is roomy %26 works well. The fridge part has two shelves, plus a small drawer under the bottom shelf. I had surgery %26 have not been able to walk on both feet, so this fridge in my bedroom has kept me fed with healthy foods while I have been recuperating.

reviews.title: A must buy!
reviews.text: My mini fridge just arrived today and so far I like what I see! It has enough storage space and that’s a plus for me being that my original fridge been out some time now and I  didn’t have anywhere to place my meat. No scratches and as soon as I plugged the fridge up it started to get cold. I would highly recommend getting this mini fridge! Trust me you will not be disappointed. And another great thing.. it came with a mini ice tray and scooper.

reviews.title: good for the price.
reviews.text: good little fridge for the price. it has a small fridge area, regular mustard dressing etc wont fit upright anywhere. it does have a spot for a 2L and holds drink cans well. i fashioned corkboard under mine for i have polished concrete floors, its fairly quiet, i do have it in my room.

reviews.title: Received damaged but I still love it
reviews.text: I received my package two days after I ordered it and the box had one vertical crease in it but otherwise it looked fine but when we opened the box the fridge door has 3 dents in it so I can’t tell if it was packaged like that or happened during transit, but it’s just like a real fridge and is big enough to hold a quite a bit of items and compact enough to have in a bedroom without taking too much space and the price was very reasonable I just wish it was not dented , returning products is inconvenient so I’ll just deal with it, other than the dents it’s perfect

reviews.title: Used Fridge
reviews.text:
1. Fridge was received with no bottom on the box, so when I pulled up, it jusg came right off over the fridge (which was helpful but concerning regarding transit. 

2. there are scratches and fading paint and bubbles 

3. inside was dirty 

4. Cord was stuff in between some coils and was difficult to get out without bending some of the coil pieces. 

5. No setup manual, just a small manual about how to care for the fridge and change the sides the door opens on.

This was my second attempt to order a small fridge.  The first one was delivered about 200 miles away.  Walmart did reimburse, and give me a $25 credit, but I still had to start the process again.  Also, the fridge wasn't even eligible for the $25!   I ordered this one, and it came damaged.  The freezer door is quite dented, it is still functional though.  I started a chat and was transferred to 3 different people.  No one asked how they could correct the situation, just wanted to start the return process.  This is a large item and returning is difficult.  I simply wanted to make you guys aware and possible get some credit.  Not to mention I placed 2 orders, with 3-5 items in each order, and received each item individually on different days!  Ever consider consolidating to save resources and energy??  No worries, I already cancelled my membership.

reviews.title: Drop kicked ?
reviews.text: I knew as soon as I saw the box on my porch, that the outcome wasnt going to be good. The fridge is nice, however, who ever delivered or packed this up must have drop kicked it. disappointing to say the least. This was a gift for my husband for his work. Lesson learned wont order anything to be delivered again

reviews.title: Bad customer service and defect product
reviews.text: My order arrived with the box tore and missing the bottom piece. When I opened it there was a dent on the front door and the door wouldn't stay shut! I immediately returned it upon realizing it was a defect yet today when i got home from work it was back on my doorstep. What exactly am i supposed to do with this fridge now?

reviews.title: So far so good.
reviews.text: This mini fridge is great so far! It's pretty quiet until the compressor is running, but that is to be expected. There's plenty of space in both compartments and it keeps everything nice and cold. I appreciated the detailed instructions on how to maintain my fridge and the scraper for the ice droplets that accumulate which is minimal for mine. I like the mini ice tray, but I don't really use it. It's still a nice addition to having this fridge. Overall I'm satisfied with my purchase.

reviews.title: Legendary Refrigerator
reviews.text: i like that the fridge is literally like a small fridge, it's separated from freezer to fridge and it works very well. it has just enough space for everything you need..

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.text: My shopping experience was good. I hoped I could find this fridge in a nearby Walmart, but not this time, so I ordered online. It seems that every 2 years they have a great selection but the year everyone wants one is the off year. I am satisfied with the product and happy with the speedy delivery. The freezer holds a great variety of frozen foods and freezes like the Artic. We had Hot Pockets, pancake/sausage on a stick, several breakfast bowls, a bag of chicken wings, and a few more items, these were opened full-sized boxes. There is room for all the regular refrigerator foods and many bottles and cans of liquids.  We plugged it up with a surge protector, of course.  I hope this little bugger lasts a very long time.  The other one I had, very much like this one, did.

reviews.title: Great for any bedroom or dorm room!
reviews.text: Perfect little fridge for my bedroom! It stores all of my little drinks and snacks well as well as my bunnies vegetables. It is all kept cool and you can even control the temperature inside as well. I love the fact that there is a separate freezer as well!

reviews.title: Fridge struggles to stay below 40 degrees at MAX!
reviews.text: I originally bought this with intention to store products like yogurt and deli meat in it to alleviate space in the main fridge that I share with roommates. The fridge struggles to stay below 40 degrees set at nearly max temperature (temperatures any higher will result in meat/dairy spoilages). This product has been shipped to my address (I live in a Mid-rise building) due to the fact that this wouldn't fit in my car. I'm greatly disappointed and feel stuck with a appliance that doesn't serve really any purpose other than what I originally intended to bought it for. I own a 2nd mini fridge that is the Igloo 3.2 Cubic and that thing easily sits at 35 degrees set not even 3 quarters of the way to max. I should of just bought a 2nd igloo mini fridge. Probably will end up returning this product somehow if seller does not provide solutions to my issue that don't involve me going way out of my way.

reviews.title: Best mini fridge freezer EVER
reviews.text: I did a lot of shopping before I made this purchase. And a lot of disappointment at bigger stores like Lowe’s in Home Depot. Best bang for the buck and I didn’t even have to go in the store. I ordered it online and two people carried it out and put it in the backseat of my car.  and I love the fact that there’s no wasted space for cans. I’m able to put jars in the areas some people might put their soda or beer.

The delivery service is atrocious, once I received the product, I noticed several shards all in the refrigerator, to my surprise, they broke one of the glass shelves due to the mishandling of the product during delivery, and this is something that should not happen ever

reviews.title: It is a good freezer, but not refrigerator
reviews.text: I enjoyed it for the couple first days, but then noticed that the back of it was full of ice. Anything that I would place in the middle of the refrigerator, everything in the back would freeze. Half of my eggs would be frozen half of my drinks would be frozen, but the freezer works really well.

reviews.title: Great value for the low price.
reviews.text: I love my Arctic King 3.2 Cu ft two door mini fridge. I’m using it in my bedroom and it fits perfectly in the space I have for it. The freezer is a nice size with a shelf on the door and inside the fridge with its two shelves, a bin for fruits and veggies, and spaces on the door that can hold a half gallon of milk or juice, six cans of soda gives me plenty of storage space. And, it’s energy efficient, only $38 per year.

reviews.title: Best on the market today!
reviews.text: In the last 3 months I’ve bought 3 “mini fridges” and either returned them or gave them away. This beautiful perfect in every way mini fridge is EXACTLY what a small refrigerator is supposed to be! The perfect size, exceptionally clean and well put together. I’m proud of this purchase and I will recommend it to everyone. The freezer is perfect  and it’s got a vegetable cubby. I love that it’s glass shelves instead of plastic. It’s really nice thank you guys.

reviews.title: i love it!!!! it does the job
reviews.text: idk why i thought it'll be bigger but it'll have to do. it does its job so i can't complain at all. don't pay the pictures any mind the top is junky lol i have toddler that love messing with the food

reviews.title: Very Damaged Box and Item
reviews.text:
I don't know if this refrigerator works or not because the box arrived very damaged. It was only held together on the bottom by the nylon strips.  The refrigerator was so dented upward and inward that the right back side could not be made level to the ground even with adjusting the feet. 
See pictures. 
Too bad.

reviews.title: i love it!!!! it does the job
reviews.text: idk why i thought it'll be bigger but it'll have to do. it does its job so i can't complain at all. don't pay the pictures any mind the top is junky lol i have toddler that love messing with the food

reviews.title: damaged
reviews.text: it arrived today damaged - can I have an option to pick it up and replace it with a new item? it is too heavy for me to return by mail or return to walmart store;;

reviews.title: I was worried mine would arrive damaged
reviews.text:
First I must say I am very happy with the fridge itself.  Its nice having a freezer that actually freezes. And has room for 1/2 gallon of ice cream and several frozen dinners. Unlike most small 1 - 3  cubic foot refrigerators. The trade off is that the refrigerator compartment is about the size of a 1 cf mini fridge.

And after reading several reviews stating that people had received damaged, scratched,

reviews.title: Very Good For It's Value
reviews.text: I would definitely recommend buying this fridge, especially if it's just for your bedroom and you want it for personal foods away from your family. It can hold small packaged meals and sodas, as well as up to a 2 Liter drink on the side. It also comes with a freezer for any ice cream or frozen foods that you might want. All in all a very good fridge and I recommend getting one for yourself!

reviews.title: Don't bother Walmart just call Galanz
reviews.text: mini fridge arrived damaged and with a bent frame. Contacted walmart and all they could offer was a return which would require me to rebox the product which I am unable to do or a refund which still required return of the product. However after calling Galanz they were quick to assess the situation and not only are providing me with a new shelf (which is out of stock due to covid understandably) and are having their support staff evaluate if it's safe to operate. My recommendation unless you have a truck capable of transporting the freezer is to contact Galanz direct as soon as you receive the fridge if it is damaged on delivery. while they have a year warranty you only have a month of full service warranty to claim damages done in shipping

It's perfect no dents work find for now but will see how it do in the future and it also came with an small ice tray and also if you going to buy one get an surge protector for it just for safety because I did because want to protect the outlet too at the same time

reviews.title: Disappointed with damages

Who wants to pay full price for something damaged?  Looks like something could be done about better packing if so many of these arrive damaged to customers.

reviews.title: Damaged item, not satisfy with the purchase
reviews.text: Fridge was delivered with dent in the back. I read many comments and many of them have the same issue, damaged fridge as delivering. I wonder why walmart doesnt change the shipping service to improve it. The fridge works fine until now but I did not satisfy with the purchase.

reviews.title: Don't Know If Damage Has Affected Operation...
reviews.text:
The refrigerator looks like it was slammed in one corner, dropped on that corner or something heavy was placed on that corner. Despite the fact that it was packed in Styrofoam boards and boxed with Styrofoam panels, it looks like it was dropped in one corner and there is crush damage. This is meant to be a Christmas present and I spent $200 on it. The least that could be done was deliver it in pristine condition.  I haven't turned it on yet so I don't know if the damage has affected operation. 

I'll be contacting Walmart.

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.text: i wasworried about there reviews but none of them were on the product but on shipping thru FedEx.    this wasn't an issue for me. fridge came in original fridgadare box covered and protected and packed with Styrofoam. My fedex shippers were awesome and even brought the fridge into my house. Imvery happy with buying a $500  fridge for $215. free shipping as well! Very happy!

reviews.title: DOA
reviews.text: Item came damaged, DOA. Item was delivered today, the box looks OK, no signs of damage, but when I opened it, i noticed there was oil leaking from the compressor (the padding carton board was soaked with oil and there were oil stains all over the compressor and the wires surrounding it). I set the fridge up and leave it there for a 6 hours, then tried plugging in the power but it doesn't work. The motor/compressor tried to start, but a few second later it makes some kind of knocking sounds, then the fridge shakes for 5, 6 seconds then everything stops. Then about a minute later, the whole cycle starts again and again...... I left it on like that for about 30 mins and the fridge's interior didn't get cool at all. Looks like its compressor is dead.

reviews.title: Great purchase!
reviews.text: This is a great little fridge.  I have only had it a couple weeks but it came in perfect shape with no issues.  Also, a great price to boot so I can't complain.   I was going to purchase later on but with this sale I couldn't resist.  It's been great to catch the overflow from the holidays that don't fit in the big fridge. I'm so happy with my purchase and it will come in super handy once graduation comes around.

reviews.title: 17.5 Frigidaire   It  works great.
reviews.text: Will need ice trays for ice cubes.  Small but plenty of room for eggs bread. Meats. Milk. Has storage bin.   Door also has space to place items.   Not your normal size refrigerator but works just as well for back up or even for 1-2 people.  It is very nice aesthetically. I am 5'4 and it's taller then me to give you an idea.keeps things cold and frozen

reviews.title: Small Refrigerator/Freezer - No Complaints
reviews.text:
Having problems with my basement beer fridge so decided to add a cheap small unit to supplement my needs. Appliance was packaged well, I fully expected damage upon arrival due to many of the customer reviews. Unit was unboxed and had adequate styrofoam packaging, no dents and scratch-free. Plugged in and after a night of running on temp control setting of 3.5 freezer is at 6.4F and fridge is 39.6F. There is a weird plastic cover on the compressor that Google tells me is to catch any possible condensation. Draws less than 2 amps of power when compressor is running. 

So far I'm pleased with the price, performance and the rapid undamaged delivery.  Your experience may be different - good luck.

reviews.title: Fridge is perfect, delivery service may not be
reviews.text:
So far this fridge has been perfect. Its a great dorm/studio/auxiliary fridge for 1-2 people.
I have it in my room in this perfect spot that looks like it was made for it. I'm super happy I got it on sale for about $200 with 3 year warranty; knowing that these things full price were $550 with no warranty. I see many people put low star review ratings due to issues with fedex as the shipping company that deals with the frieght. I took the risk and it arrived in perfect condition with no dents or broken items inside the refrigerator. I recommend the item but I warn everyone that it is a lottery ordering one online and delivered to the home and out of walmarts control whether the fridge arrives in perfect condition or not. The only thing I dont like about the fridge is the bulb temperature color which is yellow as I prefer a crisp white but I won't reduce my rating over something I can easily replace myself. I live on the second floor and they put a bedframe outside my door but left the fridge at the bottom of the stairs lol again nothing against walmart and nothing against fedex. It is heavy and unsafe for someone to carry it up stairs by yourself. Its bulky and awkward to carry up by yourself. Also you must wait at least 24 hours before you plug into the wall as the fridge needs to be upright for that amount of time to have the refrigerant and compressor oils settle back down

reviews.title: World-Class Fridge
reviews.text:
I bought this refrigerator for our small office,  in which five of us share the space over a couple of different shifts. 

The thing looks great and works even better. It was an immediate hit with everyone, mainly because of its 7.5 cubic feet of interior space as well as the freezer portion. Lunches, drinks, various foodstuffs and even potluck-type items go into it with ease. 

I highly recommend this fridge if you're looking for something for a small studio or one-bedroom apartment or for an office where one of those small, boxy fridges that can barely hold a six-pack of soda pop is simply too small.

reviews.title: Buy it
reviews.text: This fridge is great I love it it was about 215 after taxes and shipping an 198 before taxes an shipping my package arrived on time an they left it at my door step in a presentable way my box was not all beat up and my fridge was not beat up or damaged my fridge doesn't leak it doesn't make loud noises through the night Best Buy ever my ice cream is froze it's better than my fridge that is in the kitchen

reviews.title: Buyer Beware
reviews.text: Similar to some other reviews, there is cosmetic damage. There is no where to leave info without filing a return, so I guess I'll leave a review. The top rear right-hand corner is smashed in. it was covered with a bracket for shipping and you could not see it from just looking at the box. The front of the fridge door has a deep dent in it directly front and center, and a crease in the stainless steel as if it were hit and then forcefully pushed. Again, couldn't tell from the box. I feel like these sat in the warehouse for quite some time as the plastic sticky wrap to protect it from scratches was nearly melded to the outside and very difficult to remove, which would explain the deep discount. our fridge went down and we needed something this size asap and this was the best deal with a 3 day wait time for delivery. After unboxing it and finding all this, with the return policy, I assume it is non returnable anyway. Glad we got it on sale at the very least. With the other reviews, I feel like these should be listed as scratch and dent. Anyway, just a heads up if you're considering it. Plugged it in, stated getting cold right away, so that is good.

reviews.title: Damaged Product

I'm not trying to go through that hassle. The product does work and function as it should it's just damaged and I'm not happy with it.

reviews.title: Overheating

reviews.title: an ok laptop but I would have chosen differently
reviews.text: I had to get this laptop after my last laptop died on me; I am not the happiest with this laptop.  I was going to order an Asus with the same specs but as soon as I ordered the Asus the local store said it was out of stock.  So i bought this so I could get it the same day.  I was hesitant because I had bought two previous HP laptops; one I had to send in for warranty repair and that issue kept coming back and the other had a battery issue where the battery just went off a cliff after a less than a year.  This works ok for my needs but two things really stand out as a negative.  It took forever to make a back up drive of windows 11, it literally took the battery down to 20 percent or so because it took a few hours to complete.  I then wiped windows off the drive and installed linux mint.  And the battery is still bad.  I am regretting not getting the Asus now.   I will say the wi fi and hardware work well other than the battery.  I am able to play some lower demand games and older games on steam such as two point campus and planet zoo well.  I also don't have any issues with having ten or so tabs open on palemoon web broswer.  I don't really use the webcam so I havent tried anything with the cam.  I think the speaker(s) work well but I know some people are snobs about that.  Demanding the best on the cheaper products.  Having used this a few days, I wish I would have waited for the Asus laptop to ship instead of buying this laptop.    If your happy with HP/an HP fan, i would recommend this laptop for users who want to use this in a home office or for home schooling or for playing moderate to lower end games in a place they can plus it in.  Wont run the latest greatest games but most people would find this good for games they play.  I would not recommend for anyone wanting a laptop they can use all day without a charge.

reviews.title: DO NOT ORDER THIS COMPUTER!
reviews.text: Id give this computer 0 stars if I had the option. This computer worked for 2 MONTHS before now it completely stopped working. It never turned off completely!! even when it was sitting on the table unplugged it would die. Now It wont even turn on and I’m out $300 and a job since this was my work from home computer as I’m a stay at home mother of 2 children. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!

reviews.title: Don't Buy This
reviews.text: I read reviews and allowed them to give me hope.. don't be me. The screen resolution is terrible, gives 2005 PC. The battery life is crazy, it will die overnight, fully charged and while not being used. It lags sometimes. I hate the default search engine it has, Bing; you have to know what you're looking for because Bing has no idea. And there's a slight difficulty in learning to use it because it has neither safari or chrome, the only default applications I'm used to using. At almost $300. you're better off getting another computer. I'm very disappointed, and sadly didn't buy the warranty due to the price point.. and the only way I could've returned this was to drop it off at a Walmart and there is not Walmart in my area. Don't buy this, I would've been better off buying a tablet with an attached keyboard for a fraction of the price I paid for this.

reviews.title: Received Damaged
reviews.text: Shipping box damaged and product damaged. Electronics don’t need to be handled this rough. Returned. If the next one is shipped like this I will return again and buy elsewhere.

reviews.title: Great little workhorse 9 out of 10
reviews.text: I really like this computer. It's sturdy, but light enough to be portable. It's not cumbersome or heavy. It loads pages fast even with multiple tabs open and YouTube playing. It charges fast and has hours and hours of battery life. There is an actual delete key so you don't have to go forward and then back to delete something. Also, there is no annoying touch screen to change screens at the slightest gesture when you least expect it. The only thing that would make it a 10 out of 10 is if it had lighted keys. Otherwise, for me, this is just right.

Worked fine but than today when I went to type my password in knowing it was right everytime I login to it it said that it didn’t work and everytime I go to set up my pin again or reset it it wouldn’t let me and say that I couldn’t right now and to try it again later.

reviews.title: Best laptop for the price point
reviews.text: I just turned this on yesterday. Everything works great. For the cheapest laptop on the market, you can’t expect great volume or graphics, but it’s good enough for my needs. I needed a new laptop asap as my second Dell in a year died last week. Never going back. This little $270 HP is much better than I expected and delivered within a day of ordering.

this is the worse laptop ever. I could not accomplish anything. did not alliw several google based apps to load or even install properly. i have always used HP desktop computers. when in need of a laptop U naturally went to that. 
"Hate" being a strong word. I hated this laptop. returned after crashed on thec3rd day.

reviews.title: Greedy Security Software
reviews.text: The laptop is nice, the blue finish is nice. It came with Windows 11 installed. I normally use Win 10, Win 11 is easy to use. Sadly, it comes with Mcafee security software hidden in the computer. I have used Zonealarm for many years and wanted to stick with one company. I used Win 11 to uninstall the software so that I could install the Zonealarm that I just purchased. The software would not install because Mcgreedy reinstalled its own software again but hide the software from the Win 11 uninstall feature. I returned the Zonealarm software that I just purchased and now I hope for a refund. I needed new security software, so I purchased Norton. The same thing happened when I tried to install it, security software is installed, and I still can't find it to use Win 11 to uninstall it. Luckily, Norton has a Feret program that finds the old software and creates a simple button to start the uninstall process. The Norton software was successfully installed. Other than the incredibly annoying, deceitful Mcgreedy security software, the computer works nice. I won't be using it with battery power so I can't comment on battery life. I use the HDMI to power a monitor and it works just fine. It took hours to copy the OS to the recovery drive, so be patient, hours. The input pad is like most others, clumsy, but the switch underneath works very well, a nice "click" when depressed. I would buy again but it has been less than a week and the durability has not been tested. Seems solid enough.

reviews.title: Great Laptop For the Price
reviews.text:
I bought this laptop and received it on 4/20/24. I paid $279, but it was originally $519. The build is great for a laptop of this price. It feels high-end and that it will be durable.

I'm a student, so the 14" size is perfect for both functionality and portability. The 13th gen i3 processor is more than enough for what I'm using the laptop for.

Very pleased with my purchase and would easily buy this again!

reviews.title: So far, it's pretty good
reviews.text: Set up took a long time, but was easy. I don't like the piles of bs that HP, and Windows load on it. That stuff accumulates, and is always running in the background. Most you can't get rid of. That's kinda unfair since I bought it, and they are running the show. They should pay me.

The computer will not accept the pin that I created and apparently this is a common malady with the operating system. I came back to the store and went to the computer department and Nesha and Israel tried to help me, but I was not able to follow the directions they gave me once I did get home to get the computer working. I likely will have to return this computer and start over again which is unfortunate.

reviews.title: HP failed to deliver with this laptop
reviews.text: The sound on this laptop is horrible! Even with headphones the sound is low and difficult to hear. I've done everything to adjust the sound to no avail. This laptop is only okay for use when I need to look something up. I mainly wanted it to stream movies when away from a tv. However, the sound is way too bad for that. I found this laptop to be way over priced for having such a small storage space and very little sound. I've never experienced such a bad computer from HP.  HP sure dropped the ball on this one!
The price was amazing. Was $**** and marked down to $****. Very easy to use, and it came the day after I purchased,  which I was not expecting, but saved my behind at work.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I honestly loved this  Chromebook I use it for school especially to take notes the pen comes in hand. Very light to carry in my backpack and was was walk around with it In my hands. I can have it set up as a lap top to watch videos.

reviews.title: Terrible Product
reviews.text: The only reason I purchased this Chromebook was to receive a stellar Google AI Premium offer; however, I could not redeem the offer because the device already redeemed the office. The security tape was neatly cut with a knife and I immediately suspected that Walmart or Asus shipped a used product instead of a new product. I will be returning the used product immediately. In my short time with the Chromebook, the keyboard reminded me of a flimsy surface keyboard. The keyboard only lays flat and not on an angle. The ergonomics will drive any user crazy. I'd avoid this product and get a Windows ARM laptop instead.

reviews.title: Stylish and portable
reviews.text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Thank you Influenster and Asus for the free Chromebook/Vivobook. The tablet is convenient, lightweight, and portable. It comes with a detachable keyboard so you can switch from work to play. What I especially love is its portability, so I can bring it anywhere with me, whether it's for travel or bringing some overtime work to the beach. We actually brought it to the coast this weekend and I was able to finish all my emails while enjoying camping. The versatility is amazing.

reviews.title: I absolutely love it
reviews.text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This Chromebook 10 and a half inch touch 2 in 1 tablet is really nice the quality is great I absolutely love the screen it is so crisp and clear the display quality is wonderful the battery life is good I watched a whole movie and I still had almost a full battery when it comes to storage it seems like it will hold a good amount and it does not lag the performance is really nice I absolutely love the styler that comes with it it has a little bit of a weight to it which makes it seem more luxurious you do have to charge the styler which I'm not used to but it's pretty nice and it doesn't take long to charge the tablet computer also the keyboard is so cool it pulls off and clicks back in like a magnet and the keys itself are easy to touch and move and also I love the fact that you can take pictures and they're pretty crisp as well the music is nice the volume gets to a good height but I would not say this is for anybody that likes Bass other than that I really like it it's great and I would say people that are in college would absolutely love it because of the apps that come with it

reviews.title: Wonderful for daily use and travel
reviews.text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is the best of both worlds!!  A laptop that transitions into a tablet so easily. I love how compact it is and lightweight to carry around for daily usage. I was impressed with the battery life considering how small it is and how well it performs. reviews.title: Review from a college student - 5 stars!!
reviews.text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This 2-in-1 tablet is actually a necessity for any on the go college student. In 2 months, I've taken this Chromebook to class, lab, work, coffee shops and even on a cruise so I could use it to study for a midterm. It is so convenient and fits in my purse! It connects to the internet very fast and I love that all my google apps are so easily accessible. My favorite app is the cursive app which makes all my notes super easy to write and accessible from anywhere that I can log in to my google drive. The stylus that it comes with is pretty thin and lightweight so I was skeptical, but it was still comfortable to hold and write with. I love using it to study flashcards because I could download the Quizlet app on it. If you're switching between this and a full size laptop or desktop computer, the keyboard is smaller and does not have all keys (like caps lock for example) so it would be an adjustment. But when I'm home I like using this to watch lecture videos (the display quality and sound is great) and using a full size laptop to type notes or an assignment. It charges very fast with USB-C and stays charged for a long time compared to my laptop. I can see the felt-like magnetic stand attachment and keyboard getting dirty after a while but that's pretty much the only con. I wouldn't use this to do any big projects or papers on, but for everything else - this is my go to.

reviews.title: Great Tablet that Acts Like a Laptop
reviews.text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have been using the ASUS Chromebook for about a month and love it. It's great little workhorse — a tablet that can act like a lap top, with both a touch screen plus a key board. I will eventually try to add a wireless mouse. This is new to me as I have been a longtime Macbook user, so the touch screen is a big bonus for me. And this Chromebook has been so easy to use, right out of the box. It comes with a cover that props up like an easel to use as a lap top and for Zoom calls and such. And it's light enough to carry to a cafe when working remotely. Google Play makes it very easy to download apps. I cannot say enough good things about it.

reviews.title: Compact, fast, great for travel
reviews.text:
[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The things I love: 
This is so lightweight and has a removable kickstand. It is super easy to set and charges using standard USB, so I don't need to carry an extra charger everywhere. 
There is only one software update during setup, and the updates run in the background in the future. I love this because I always have to wait for updates on my current laptop. 
I am a teacher who uses Google Apps for everything. I love that Chromebook allows me to use my sign-in for everything and download apps through the Play Store. 

Keep in mind, based on size, it is definitely a tablet more than a laptop. Great for travel or working on the go, but you may want a bigger laptop or chromebook for work projects.

reviews.title: Terrible Product
reviews.text: The only reason I purchased this Chromebook was to receive a stellar Google AI Premium offer; however, I could not redeem the offer because the device already redeemed the office. The security tape was neatly cut with a knife and I immediately suspected that Walmart or Asus shipped a used product instead of a new product. I will be returning the used product immediately. In my short time with the Chromebook, the keyboard reminded me of a flimsy surface keyboard. The keyboard only lays flat and not on an angle. The ergonomics will drive any user crazy. I'd avoid this product and get a Windows ARM laptop instead.

reviews.title: Iphone 15 pro
reviews.text:
The iPhone 15 pro came out in September 2023, and many other devices were released in 2023, also including new software updates. The iPhone 15 pro is supposed to have a longer battery life, a new USB-C charger that charges faster than the previous chargers, and a new action button. The iPhone 15 costs $999 with 128GB, and with TB it is $1499.
I had the iPhone 12 for about 3 years, and I noticed that it was time to upgrade my phone since my iPhone 12 was slow and lacked many of the newer updates. I upgrade my phone in late November or early December. The phone took a little longer than two weeks to arrive. When I finally got my phone and used it I immediately realized how much longer the battery life lasted, when I had the iPhone 12 I barely could make it through the day without it dying, but with the iPhone 15 pro, it lasts the entire day of school even with me being on it constantly. I also had the realization that it charged faster than my last and had a better reaction time when clicking or swiping out of tabs. However, the price of the phone is very pricey. I believe if you are looking to upgrade the iPhone 15 pro is great and I would rate a 5 if the price was more affordable but since it is not I believe it is a 4.5 stars overall. I would recommend you get the iPhone 15 pro.
